variation.description: XSLT - xsl:import | Nesting Imports | Nested xsl:import with import
XSLT - xsl:import | Nesting Imports | Nested xsl:import with include
XSLT- xsl:import | Valid Cases | Base Case - Import a stylesheet with a relative URL
XSLT- xsl:import | Valid Cases | Import a Stylesheet which has the same template matching pattern as in the imported stylesheet
XSLT- xsl:import | Valid Cases | Import the same Stylesheet multiple times
XSLT- xsl:import | Valid Cases | Import a Stylesheet which has simplified Literal result element as Stylesheet
XSLT- xsl:import | Valid Cases | Import a Stylesheet with has DTD in it
XSLT- xsl:import | Valid Cases | Import a Stylesheet which has ID for it
XSLT- xsl:import | Valid Cases | Commenting an <xsl:import /> tag shouldn't not import the stylesheet
XSLT- xsl:import | Import Precedence | A <= B, C where B <= D and C <= E | Resultant precedence should be ABCDE
XSLT- xsl:import | Import Precedence | A <= B, C where B <= D and C <= E | Templates A=B and C=D, Result is ACE
XSLT- xsl:import | Import Precedence | A <= B, C where B <= D and C <= E | All Templates are same, A Wins
XSLT- xsl:import | Import Precedence | A <= B, C where B <= D and C <= E | All Templates are same but different priorities A1B3C4D2E5 , A wins again
XSLT- xsl:import | Interaction with xsl:include | A includes B imports C, Same template matches but priorities are A1B2C3, B Wins
XSLT - xsl:import | Interaction with xsl:include | A imports B includes C, Same template matches but priorities are A1B2C3, A Wins
XSLT - xsl:import | Interaction with xsl:include | B is included at the end of A. B imports C. A, B have equal priorities, B wins
XSLT - xsl:import | Error Cases | Place the xsl:import NOT as a TOP level element, include it in some Template rule
XSLT - xsl:import | Error Cases | Import a Stylesheet which imports the same stylesheet directly
XSLT - xsl:import | Error Cases | Import a Stylesheet which imports the same stylesheet indirectly
XSLT - xsl:import | Error Cases | Import a Stylesheet which is not a well formed document (no closing </> tag>
XSLT - xsl:import | Error Cases | Import a Stylesheet which is neither an XML nor an XSL document
XSLT - xsl:import | Valid Cases | Import a Stylesheet which has the same href value but relatively different path
XSLT - xsl:import | Valid Cases | Import a Stylesheet which has a full URL
XSLT - xsl:import | Valid Cases | Import a Stylesheet with conflicting top variables declared
XSLT - xsl:import | HREF Attribute Cases | Import without HREF Attribute <xsl:import/>
XSLT - xsl:import | HREF Attribute Cases | Import with HREF Attribute equal to a NULL Value (href="")
XSLT - xsl:import | HREF Attribute Cases | Import with HREF Value set to blank spaces
XSLT - xsl:import | HREF Attribute Cases | Import a Stylesheet using Drive Letters C:\
XSLT - xsl:import | HREF Attribute Cases | Import a Stylesheet using HREF = File://
XSLT - xsl:import | HREF Attribute Cases | Import a Stylesheet using HREF set to UNC Path
XSLT - xsl:import | HREF Attribute Cases | Import an ASP which redirects to a Stylesheet
XSLT - xsl:import | HREF Attribute Cases | Import an ASP which redirects to the same the Stylesheet
XSLT - xsl:import | Boundary Cases | Import a Stylesheet which has a longer filename
XSLT - xsl:import | Boundary Cases | Import a Stylesheet which has a longer filename (Beyond Boundary 255)
XSLT - xsl:import | Boundary Cases | Import a Stylesheet which is very large in size
XSLT - xsl:import | Security Cases | Import a Stylesheet thru HTTP which is located on a remote web server (use http://roswell)
XSLT - xsl:import | Security Cases | Import a Stylesheet thru HTTPS which is located on a remote web server (use http://roswell)
XSLT - xsl:apply-imports | Base Case | Use apply-imports with xsl:import

variation.name: Import_IncludeBeforeImportInStylesheet
variation.description: Use the xsl:include element before the xsl:import element. An exception must be thrown. [Bug 65760]

variation.name: ImportPrecedanceTest1
variation.description: XSLT: Doesn't use post-order traversal to define import precedence. [Bug 71823]

variation.name: ImportPrecedanceTest2
variation.description: XSLT: Doesn't use post-order traversal to define import precedence. [Bug 71823]

variation.name: NestedImportsWithModeTemplate
variation.description: Use of nested imports does not produce correct results for templates. [Bug 70863]

variation.name: NestedImportsWithNoMatch
variation.description: Using apply-imports in an imported file, when no matches are found, should invoke built-in template rules. [Bug 70947]

variation.name: VariableScopeInNestedImports
variation.description: Test for variable scope in main and imported stylesheets. [Bug 71029]
